ask.question: When applying patching compound, it is a good idea to cut a notch in one side of the broad knife blade, _______________, to be used to screed around finished edges.

answer.B: To the thickness of the flooring

answer.C: Twice the thickness of the flooring

answer.D: Half the thickness of the flooring

answer.correct: B - To the thickness of the flooring

ask.question: The two categories of patching and leveling products are:

answer.A: Portland and skim coat based compounds.

answer.B: Gypsum and skim coat based compounds.

answer.correct: C - Portland and Gypsum based compounds.
